Synopsis:
Khankluay, a fantastic 3D animated film from Thailand, takes you to join the amazing journey of a little elephant called Khankluay on his wonderful adventure. Khankluay is a young elephant who lives his carefree life in a forest, but he\\\&#039;s always wondering of his lost father whom he\\\&#039;s never met. Inspired by the intention to search for his father, Khankluay leaves the forest and sets his journey to the bigger world. His journey brings such an extraordinary adventure to him. He\\\&#039;s experienced so many lessons of life, and finds real friends. Finally, Khankluay becomes a mature elephant who\\\&#039;s so brave and powerful, but has a gentle heart. He fights for the king and country until his courage becomes a legend.

Notes: Audio has some bad recorded. Every 15 minutes of movie has one minute end/blank of film. May be someone has more knowledge and tool to cut and join then re-upload.
